  • imx6ul gpio 在device tree 中的配置

    Migarated from here at ‘2016-07-08 18:28:43’. 内核版本：linux-3.14.38 以GPIO1_IO13为例: 在arch/arm/boot/dts/imx6ul-14x14-evk.dts中: pinctrl_hog_1: hoggrp-1 { fsl,pins = <                              MX6UL_PAD_LCD_RESET__WDOG1_WDOG_ANY   0x30b0 MX6UL_PAD_UART1_RTS_B__GPIO1_IO19     0x17059 MX6UL_PAD_GPIO1_IO05__USDHC1_VSELECT  0x17059 MX6UL_PAD_GPIO1_IO09__GPIO1_IO09      0x17059 MX6UL_PAD_JTAG_TDI__GPIO1_IO13        0xC0000000 >; }; MX6UL_PAD_JTAG_TDI__GPIO1_IO13: 宏定义引脚JTAG_TDI功能复用为GPIO13; 0xC0000000: 0x80000000 is special and means “I don’t know and don’t change from the default” Bit 30 set to 1 means: software input on (SION) whcih...
